artifacts.summary: Analysis of sorry feasibility and cleanup recommendations - sorry is architecturally blocked

partial_progress.details: Research complete with cleanup recommendations. Sorry in valid_implies_semantic_truth is architecturally blocked - cannot be fixed without fundamental changes. Recommends moving AlgebraicSemanticBridge.lean and HybridCompleteness.lean to Boneyard.

findings.blocking_reason: IsLocallyConsistent only enforces modus ponens direction, not full propositional closure needed for truth correspondence
cleanup_recommendations: Move AlgebraicSemanticBridge.lean to Boneyard (v003 failed approach)
Move HybridCompleteness.lean to Boneyard (v004 failed approach)
Keep semantic_weak_completeness as primary sorry-free result
Add architectural gap documentation to SemanticCanonicalModel.lean
